level.heading: Sprinkler requirements.
level.text: ยง 27-404 Sprinkler requirements. Sprinkler protection meeting the construction requirements of subchapter seventeen of this chapter shall be installed in all high hazard occupancies. Where the nature of the fire hazard is such that water is not effective as an extinguishing agent, the extinguishing agent to be used, shall be subject to the approval of the fire commissioner.
